quotes.text: Get it twisted. If you lock in you can do anything. Your actions impact nothing. Your fate is predetermined. The only thing you can change is your reaction to it. You can do anything you set your mind to. The world is a playground designed for you and only you.
quotes.author: The Library of Letourneau

quotes.text: The stars don't look bigger, but they do look brighter.
quotes.author: Sally Ride
